meanings.definition: A man who engages in sports or athletic activities.
meanings.sent1: The sportsmen practiced soccer every afternoon.
meanings.sent2: The sportsmen competed in the swimming race.
meanings.sent3: The sportsmen tried to play basketball with a watermelon, but it didn't go well.
meanings.sent4: The group of sportsmen were like a pack of wolves on the field, hunting for victory.
meanings.sent5: The image of the sportsmen running under the blazing sun stayed in my mind.
